# Stock Information

The Peoples Bank is a wholly-owned subsidiary of Peoples Financial Corporation, listed on the OTCQX Best Market under the symbol **PFBX**. To view stock information, click on any of the following links and they will take you to OTCMarkets' website: 

  * [Stock Quote](https://www.otcmarkets.com/stock/PFBX/quote)
  * [News](https://www.otcmarkets.com/stock/PFBX/news)
  * [Chart](https://www.otcmarkets.com/stock/PFBX/overview)
  * [Financials](https://www.otcmarkets.com/stock/PFBX/financials)
  * [Research Reports](https://www.otcmarkets.com/stock/PFBX/research)
  * [SEC Filings/Holdings/Insiders](https://www.otcmarkets.com/stock/PFBX/disclosure)
